name: Soul Mates
description:
Welcome to Soul Mates: A dating sim for dead people! Pursue love in the afterlife as a ghost in a town full of other single spirits. Court quirky characters, go on haunting dates, and procure romantic gifts for your spectral suitors.

To celebrate this Halloween, come try out our first demo!

Download instructions:

  1. Download the zipped folder from this page
  2. Extract all files from the zipped folder
  3. In the extracted files, run SoulMatesGame.exe
  4. Enjoy!

Player survey: https://forms.gle/SsfMQf9YZ25M9x1b6
